example.name: transitive
example.text: The opposition Labor Party leader , Neil Kinnock , in a display of the male chauvinism typical of the British lower class , denounced Mrs. Thatcher for [*-2] having an independent mind and refusing [*-1] to heed the men in her Cabinet .
